definition: winding road/roundabout route/detour/(fig.) wrong way (of doing sth)
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
surname Lu
to take an indirect route/to waste one's time by using an inappropriate method

sentences.english: I sincerely hope we can go point to a small roundabout, like me.
sentences.chinese: 我真心的希望大家可以向我一樣少走點彎路。

sentences.english: The biggest challenge is to stay on track & not allow yourself to be side-tracked.
sentences.chinese: 最大的挑戰是要保持正確的方向，不走彎路。

sentences.english: I do not want you to make detours, remember those lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我不想讓你再走彎路，切記那些教訓。

sentences.english: In history, both China and the EU have experienced stall of growth during the time of economic self-enclosure and political division.
sentences.chinese: 歷史上，中歐都曾走過自我封閉的彎路。

sentences.english: And yes, marketers will lead the way, and probably get a lot of it wrong.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，營銷者將是帶頭者，並且很可能走很多彎路。

sentences.english: “If you do it wrong, it will come back again”.
sentences.chinese: 如果你一開始走了彎路，問題很快又會出現。

sentences.english: Around 75% say the country is on the wrong track.
sentences.chinese: 大約有75%的美國人認爲國家正在走彎路。

sentences.english: This can avoid detours on the study.
sentences.chinese: 由此可以避免學習上走彎路。

sentences.english: This is why you were born. To take that road less traveled and forge a path for others.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你的天命，直達目的少走彎路，引領革命。

sentences.english: Acording to walking little curved road, many, fast, good and economical, there is doubtlessly the important function .
sentences.chinese: 這對於少走彎路，多快好省，無疑有重要作用。

sentences.english: Avoid zigzags in preparation,and reduce the waste of investment.
sentences.chinese: 避免籌建期間走彎路，減少投資的浪費。

sentences.english: Moreover, clearing objectives can avoid detours.
sentences.chinese: 此外，明確目標可以少走彎路。

sentences.english: And try not to get detoured by Hulu along the way.
sentences.chinese: 並且不要在過程中被葫蘆迷惑而走了彎路。

sentences.english: But hardships & difficulties , wrong paths & crocked roads are the frustration he has to experience .
sentences.chinese: 不過，艱難困苦，迷離彎路都是必須經歷的挫折。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly they're less sinuated, less frustrated and less angry.
sentences.chinese: 很自然地，他們會少走彎路，不再沮喪或憤怒。

benefit/advantage/gain/profit/also pr. [hao3 chu4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

error/mistake/CL:個|个[ge4]/mistaken/false/wrong
hardships/arduous/difficult
to err/to make a mistake/to do the wrong thing
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
glancing to left and right (idiom); to look all around
to delay/to hold up/to waste time/to interfere with
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
mistaken ideas/misconceptions/the error of one's ways
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
to shrink back/to cower
misgivings/apprehensions
